text: Chandrakauns is a raga in Hindustani classical music. It is also used in tail pieces and lighter presentations of Carnatic music. == Film Songs == === Language:Tamil === {| class="wikitable" !Song !Movie !Composer !Singer |- |Maalai Pozhuthin Mayakkathile |Bhagyalakshmi |Viswanathan-Ramamoorthy |rowspan="2"|P.
